summary: With Kevin Costner narrating, lead a cast of baseball legends and scientists who explore the magic within the 396 milliseconds it takes a fastball to reach home plate, and decipher who threw the fastest pitch ever.
cast: Kevin Costner|Derek Jeter|Denard Span|Craig Kimbrel|Nolan Ryan|Justin Verlander|Bryce Harper|Miguel Cabrera|Todd Frazier|Matt Harvey|Giancarlo Stanton|Yasiel Puig|Andrew McCutchen|David Price|Chris Cooper
title: Fastball
